ygData.subject: Re: Bards questing
ygData.msgSnippet: HAHAHHAAhahah..... I ve never seen that key phrase before.  I nearly had an accident.  The key phrase is klatu verada nicto backwards, which was the secret
ygData.messageBody:
HAHAHHAAhahah..... I've never seen that key phrase before. I nearly had an
accident. The key phrase is "klatu verada nicto" backwards, which was the
secret phrase given to a woman by the alien in the classic "The Day The
Earth Stood Still." I love finding things like that.

--Gaelaian Galaenor, 22nd level trivia buffing bard, Tunare.


> From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
> 3. Charm Kizdean and while he is charmed give him the key phrase "utalk
> adarev otcin". He will then give you the note and you can bugger off
before
> he breaks charm and remembers he hates your guts.
